title: STF arrests man for transporting over 1 kgs of ICE drugs in Wattala
body_lines: A 37-year-old man was arrested while transporting more than 1 kg of Methamphetamine known as ICE drugs in Wattala.
Following information received by the STF Gonahena Camp, the suspect was arrested with 1 kilogram and 20 grams of ice which has a street value of more than Rs. 10 million.
The suspect, a resident of Mannar, was handed over to the Narcotics Bureau for further investigation.
